modName: HD Stone Quarry and Clay Deposit for Hearthfire
summary: Finally, a high definition retexture for the Stone Quarry and Clay Deposit resources added by the Hearthfire DLC - created with high standards. Available in 2K and 1K.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img23/9904/l2kg.jpg[/img][/center]
High definition texture and mesh replacers for the Stone Quarry and Clay Deposit resources added by the Hearthfire DLC which until now has very few replacers available (none for the clay deposit yet). These are hand-made, high-quality textures done from scratch. Meshes are also modified to reduce the stretching (obvious in vanilla) and to enable Parallax effect.

FEATURES:
- Realistic High Defintion 2k Textures for Stone Quarry and Clay Deposit (Also available in 1K version for performance)
- Enhanced Normal Maps for realism
- Enhanced meshes to minimize stretching and seams
- Parallax-enabled for enhanced 3D look (works best with ENB but not required)
- Removed the annoying "plastic" shine on clay deposit
*** Default version of HD Stone Quarry is designed for use with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37256//?]"Superior Rock Textures- Dark grey"[/url]
***Optional variants of HD Stone Quarry are available for Vanilla and Superior Rock Textures - light grey

Requirements:
Hearthfire DLC
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37256//?]Superior Rock Textures [/url](optional but highly recommended)

Installation:
Extract the archive contents into your Skyrim data folder, overwrite the files when prompted.

=======================================================================
Permissions:
=======================================================================
Do not upload this mod to any other site other than NEXUS
Do not use or modify the assets from this mod for your own mods without permission from the author.
[center]
See it in-game with this Video by Hodilton:
[youtube]lSvLHDhubbU[/youtube]

Video by GamerPoets
[youtube]iUex6GbqjRw[/youtube]

OPTIONAL VARIANTS FOR STONE QUARRY:
[img]http://imageshack.com/scaled/large/844/i45j.jpg[/img][img]http://imageshack.com/scaled/large/46/97ck.jpg[/img]
COMPARISONS:

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img189/7616/3uqj.jpg[/img]
